tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE property_maintenance (
  property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  property_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  maintenance_schedule TEXT,
  last_maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_expense DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE expenses (
    expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id INT,
    expense_type VARCHAR(255),
    expense_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (property_id) REFERENCES property_maintenance_schedule(property_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PropertyOwners (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  owner_name VARCHAR(255),
  property_address VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceTasks (
  task_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  description TEXT,
  frequency VARCHAR(50),
  cost DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLog (
  log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  task_id UUID REFERENCES MaintenanceTasks(task_id),
  property_id UUID REFERENCES PropertyOwners(id),
  completion_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE BudgetPlanning (
  budget_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  estimated_expense DECIMAL,
  actual_expense DECIMAL,
  budget_month DATE
)

CREATE TABLE properties (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   property_name VARCHAR(255),
   address VARCHAR(255),
   last_maintenance_date DATE,
   next_maintenance_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_tasks (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   task_name VARCHAR(255),
   task_description TEXT,
   estimated_duration INT,
   cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
   property_id INT REFERENCES properties(id)
)

CREATE TABLE expenses (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   expense_date DATE,
   expense_description TEXT,
   amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
   property_id INT REFERENCES properties(id)
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_history (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   task_id INT REFERENCES maintenance_tasks(id),
   completion_date DATE,
   comments TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE budget_planning (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   year INT,
   total_budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
)
